mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, user_tele, create_time, login_time, nickname
mapper.insert: insert into app_user (user_id, user_name, password, user_tele, create_time, login_time, nickname) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into app_user
user_id,
user_name,
password,
user_tele,
create_time,
login_time,
nickname,

mapper.update:
update app_user
user_name = #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_tele = #{user_tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_time = #{login_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update app_user set user_name = #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_tele = #{user_tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_time = #{login_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM app_user u WHERE u.user_name = #{user_name} AND u.password = #{password}
SELECT u.* FROM app_user u WHERE u.`user_name` = #{user_name}
